source_sentence: 并可呼諸鬼神來共人語。
translation: It also calls on the spirits to come and speak with him.
It'll also cure all demonic energies.

source_sentence: 若天炎旱以黃牛糞塗地。
translation: If the sky is hot and dry, rub yellow cow dung on the ground.
Make a dragon with three heads on its back.
Beneath it, it'll be a four-square dragon pond.
Inside the dragon's pond, he puts gold.
Its altar is blue in color.
Yellow dung is painted on the dragon's body.

source_sentence: 於壇四角各置一滿瓶水。
translation: On each of the four corners of the altar, he places a full vial of water.
He also places four incense burners and places four new tile pots.
He places four new tiled basins.

source_sentence: 一盆中著乳一盆著酪一盆置乳糜一盆置酥及沙糖。
translation: In one pot, he puts milk, in another he puts cream, in another he puts minced milk, and in another he puts ghee and sugar.

source_sentence: 又別作四肘方壇以牛糞塗飾。
translation: He also makes a separate four-quadrant altar and decorates it with cow dung.
It's also decorated with cow dung. Another layer of sandalwood is painted on the altar.
On the inside of the altar, four arrows are inserted.
It's wrapped with five-colored thread and hung with five banners.

source_sentence: 燒四種香所謂安悉熏陸白檀蘇合。
translation: He burns four kinds of incense, called arsenicum, which perfumes the land and contains white sandalwood.
Inside the altar, he scatters seven kinds of grain.
It's lined with five-colored foods and flowers and fruits.
The person reciting the mantra faces east.

source_sentence: 取一芥子呪之一遍皆令擲。
translation: He takes a mustard seed and makes it fall over once.

source_sentence: 打畫龍頭上一呪一擲滿千八遍龍即行雨。
translation: He strikes a picture dragon on the head and tosses one spell a thousand or eight times, and the dragon produces rain.
All the dragons will come and subdue it.

source_sentence: 若欲止雨取白芥子誦呪。
translation: If you want to stop the rain, take a white mustard seed and recite the spell.

source_sentence: 呪之擲龍池中雨即便止。
translation: Tossing it into a dragon's pond stops the rain even after the spell is cast.
If you want to stop the rain from falling due to bad winds and hail, take a spell made of khadira wood and recite it.
Take a piece of khadira wood and make a spike out of it.
Pinning it to the edge of the dragon's pond will stop the hail.
If he wants to bind Vaiḍāyaka.
Take a white mustard seed spell and repeat it 108 times.
Put it on Vaiḍāyaka's head.
It won't be able to obstruct it.

source_sentence: 以乳洗毘那夜迦即得解脫。
translation: Washing Vaiṇāyaka with milk will free him.
All the actions he takes will be accomplished.

source_sentence: 其持呪者常須清潔著鮮淨衣。
translation: Those who keep the spell must always be clean and wear fresh, pure clothing.
This is the basic dhāraṇī.
